subject: Olympic Games
lead_paragraph: Cadel Evans captured the Pro Tour title at the Giro di Lombardia, finishing sixth behind the winner Damiano Cunego yesterday in Como, Italy.Cunego, with the Lampre team, covered the 150-mile route from Varese to Como in 5 hours 52 minutes 48 seconds. He beat Riccardo Ricco in a sprint finish. Cunego also won the season-ending classic in 2004, the same year he won the Giro d’Italia.Evans entered the race with 227 points. Alberto Contador (191) did not enter and Alejandro Valverde (190) was out with the flu.Danilo Di Luca, who led Evans by 15 points, was excluded from the race after he was handed a three-month ban this week by the Italian Olympic Committee after a doping investigation.
